Lightless Lantern

miscellaneous (lvl 6)

item id [id]: 337
darkvision [darkvision]: 100
horrormark chance [taint]: 3%
research bonus [researchbonus]: +12
void returning bonus [voidret]: 10%

Requires 5F to forge (F1)

This lantern shines with hidden light. The dark light reveals secrets and is a great help when researching magic spells. However, this dark light may also reveal the bearer of the lantern to the Horrors lurking beyond the Veil.
